Text:
Thanks alot man. to get best of Textaloud 3, i advice you to install neospeech julie. because by default Textaloud will use Microsoft SAM as the 'default voice' and that doesn't sound very human like. so install Neospeech Julie , then set Textaloud to use Julie as default voice. then it'll feel like a real lady speaking to you.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5351567/Neospeech_Julie_-_Works_w__MS_Office_2007-10_Best_Text_to_Speech
Question:  What is this installing on my machine?  Every time I open this, it installs something, and I need to know what it is.  Thanks!
